mapEngine

Class MapEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapEngine.MapEngine

  • public class MapEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The MapEngine class provides a map view on the specified WebView received as argument in its constructors. It uses Google Maps javascript API, and provides several methods to handle the map, map modalities and markers
    Author:
    Nicola Landro, Luca Landa

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapEngine

        public MapEngine(javafx.scene.web.WebView webView,
                 java.lang.Runnable endLoadingTask)
        Constructs a MapEngine instance, viewable on the specified WebView instance given as argument. When the map finishes loading, if not null, the endLoadingTask will be executed.
        Parameters:
        webView - the WebView which will display the map
        endLoadingTask - the task executed after the map finishes loading

      • MapEngine

        public MapEngine(javafx.scene.web.WebView webView,
                 java.lang.Runnable endLoadingTask,
                 double startLatitude,
                 double startLongitude)
        Constructs a MapEngine instance, viewable on the specified WebView instance given as argument. When the map finishes loading, it will be set to coordinates given as arguments, and if not null, the endLoadingTask will be executed.
        Parameters:
        webView - the WebView which will display the map
        endLoadingTask - the task executed after the map finishes loading
        startLatitude - the latitude to set the map at
        startLongitude - the longitude to set the map at

      • MapEngine

        public MapEngine(javafx.scene.web.WebView webView,
                 java.lang.Runnable endLoadingTask,
                 java.lang.String searchString)
        Constructs a MapEngine instance, viewable on the specified WebView instance given as argument. When the map finishes loading, it will be set at the result of a location search with the given searchString given as argument, and if not null, the endLoadingTask will be executed.
        Parameters:
        webView - the web view that load the html
        endLoadingTask - a task that inform when the load end
        searchString - the position in witch you want to load the map

      • setMarkerToLocation

        public java.lang.String setMarkerToLocation(java.lang.String searchString,
                                            java.lang.String markerTitle,
                                            java.lang.String markerType)
        Sets a non-draggable marker to the location result of the search, performed with the searchString given as argument
        Parameters:
        searchString - the string used to search for the location
        markerTitle - the title of the new marker
        markerType - the type of the new marker
        Returns:
        coordinates a string containing the coordinates of the new marker

                                               java.lang.String markerType)
        Sets a non-draggable marker to the specified coordinates
        Parameters:

        markerTitle - the title of the new marker
        markerType - the type of the new marker
